description: A migration debate has gripped a small Romanian town after the arrival of three Sri Lankan bakers.
title: Romania racism row: Bakers from Sri Lanka feel the heat
title_page: Romania racism row: Bakers from Sri Lanka feel the heat - BBC News
maintext: Sitting in a small room inside the private Ditroi bakery, Prasanna Piumal, 22, tells the BBC how he came to Romania to build a future. But when the race row erupted, he says "the employment agent came to see us and asked if we wanted to leave and go to Bucharest".
